img_above_text:
![Wukong Turtle 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a6/Wukong_Turtle_17.jpg)
The good news is this attack is so powerful it will leave her incredibly drained, and give you plenty of time to retaliate with all your saved up focus points, a Spirit Attack, and anything else you can throw at her!
img_below_text:
As long as your patient to wait for the right moments to get in close and attack, and make sure you're using shock-quelling medicine, you'll be able to come out on top. Even as Kang-Jin Star tries to flee in her dragon form, the Destined One will see to it that she crashes into the large cymbals, freeing the prisoner inside!
Kang-Jing Star
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Turtle 17.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/a/a6/Wukong_Turtle_17.jpg)
The good news is this attack is so powerful it will leave her incredibly drained, and give you plenty of time to retaliate with all your saved up focus points, a Spirit Attack, and anything else you can throw at her!"
        - Following Text: "As long as your patient to wait for the right moments to get in close and attack, and make sure you're using shock-quelling medicine, you'll be able to come out on top. Even as Kang-Jin Star tries to flee in her dragon form, the Destined One will see to it that she crashes into the large cymbals, freeing the prisoner inside!
Kang-Jing Star"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a scene from *Black Myth: Wukong*, showcasing the protagonist, Wukong, in a snowy environment, crouched and holding a staff. Behind him is a large, ornate cymbal-like structure, which appears to play a significant role in the narrative. Based on the surrounding text, this moment is part of a climactic battle against Kang-Jin Star, where the cymbals are instrumental in freeing a prisoner as the enemy attempts to flee in dragon form.
